text: Father of the Bride is a 1991 American comedy movie starring Steve Martin, Diane Keaton, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, George Newbern, Martin Short, B. D. Wong, Kieran Culkin and Peter Michael Goetz. It is a remake of the 1950 movie of the same name. The movie opened to positive reviews, and became a major box office success, earning more than six times its budget. With its success, a sequel, Father of the Bride Part II was released in 1995. A remake is in the works for Disney+. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies about weddings Category:Movies directed by Charles Shyer
title: Father of the Bride (1991 movie)
